rules.title: No Sexual Content
rules.description: Sexual topics and media are strictly forbidden. All adult conversations must be kept away from the server. NSFW material is not allowed on Astradal servers.

rules.title: No Harassment or Bullying
rules.description: Do not threaten or commit real life harm to others. Do not host or promote players that do. Do not tell people to harm themselves.

rules.title: No Bigotry
rules.description: No hateful language or viewpoints. This includes homophobia, racism, transphobia, sexism, antisemitism, ableism, or heterophobia. Slurs are not allowed.

rules.title: No Posting Personally Identifiable Information
rules.description: Do not reveal personal info such as addresses or phone numbers. No doxxing or self-doxxing.

rules.title: No Promoting Other Servers
rules.description: Do not post links or IPs to unrelated Discord or Minecraft servers. Discussion is allowed without promotion. No self-promotion unrelated to the server.

rules.title: No Impersonation
rules.description: Do not impersonate staff or other players.

rules.title: No Conspiracy to Break Rules
rules.description: Do not aid or abet rulebreakers. Do not spread dupes, exploits, or schemes like theft muling.

rules.title: English Only
rules.description: Only English is allowed in chat so moderation can be maintained.

rules.title: No Hacking, Cheating, or Exploiting
rules.description: No hacks, cheats, mods, or exploits. Review allowed mods list. No alt account abuse. INVENTORY WILL BE WIPED IF CAUGHT.

rules.title: No Real-Life Iconography
rules.description: No roleplaying with real-world names, symbols, ideologies, or references, especially genocidal or inappropriate ones.

rules.title: No Auto-Farms or Infinite Redstone Machines
rules.description: Except for reasonable auto-smelters, auto-brewers, and auto-honey-farms. All autofarms that are allowed

rules.title: No Inescapable Traps
rules.description: Do not create traps that are impossible to escape. Examples include nether portal traps, elder guardian traps, and cobweb dispensers.

rules.title: No Excessive or Unfair Scamming
rules.description: Do not steal from land members or abuse plugins to scam. No scamming new/returning players or using false enchantments.

rules.title: No IRL Trading
rules.description: No trading IRL money for in-game benefits.

rules.title: No Unjust or Random Killing
rules.description: No killing players without reasonable causes, such as: KOS (Kill On Sight), Self-Defense, Griefer/Raiders, War, Events, etc. Those who are killed without reasonable cause get their stuff back.

rules.title: No Meta-Gaming with Claims
rules.description: No invasive, snake, or block claiming. No firework macing.

rules.title: No IRL Politics or Religion
rules.description: Avoid discussing real-life politics or religion to prevent drama.
